template: We have an image with these objects: ['cow', 'people', 'beach', 'ocean', 'sky', 'clouds', 'sand', 'water', 'horizon', 'ocean waves', 'ocean shore', 'ocean water', 'ocean waves', 'ocean shore', 'ocean water', 'ocean waves', 'ocean shore', 'ocean water', 'ocean waves', 'ocean shore']. system
